payload.content: There are more incorrect ways to become an AI engineer than correct ones, by at least an order of magnitude.

name: There are more incorrect ways to become an AI engineer than correct ones, by at
content: There are more incorrect ways to become an AI engineer than correct ones, by at least an order of magnitude.

payload.content: To avoid wasting time, focus on learning only the essential fundamentals for an AI engineer: what a neural net is, how transformer architecture works, how to train a basic model, fine-tune a small LLM, and understand LLM/AI agent terminology.

name: To avoid wasting time, focus on learning only the essential fundamentals for an
content: To avoid wasting time, focus on learning only the essential fundamentals for an AI engineer: what a neural net is, how transformer architecture works, how to train a basic model, fine-tune a small LLM, and understand LLM/AI agent terminology.

payload.content: It is not necessary for an AI engineer to be able to calculate the chain rule by hand or implement backpropagation from scratch.

name: It is not necessary for an AI engineer to be able to calculate the chain rule by
content: It is not necessary for an AI engineer to be able to calculate the chain rule by hand or implement backpropagation from scratch.

payload.content: While learning math is useful for areas like ML research or personal curiosity, it is not strictly necessary for AI engineering.

name: While learning math is useful for areas like ML research or personal curiosity,
content: While learning math is useful for areas like ML research or personal curiosity, it is not strictly necessary for AI engineering.

payload.content: In AI engineering practice, one must think in terms of systems (including security, architecture, scaling, and production) rather than solely focusing on models.

name: In AI engineering practice, one must think in terms of systems (including securi
content: In AI engineering practice, one must think in terms of systems (including security, architecture, scaling, and production) rather than solely focusing on models.

payload.content: When building a portfolio for AI engineering, create personal projects that mimic real-world applications by incorporating aspects like evaluation, observability, deployment, and security, rather than just tutorial-based dummy projects.

name: When building a portfolio for AI engineering, create personal projects that mimi
content: When building a portfolio for AI engineering, create personal projects that mimic real-world applications by incorporating aspects like evaluation, observability, deployment, and security, rather than just tutorial-based dummy projects.

payload.content: The AI landscape is rapidly changing, making it impossible and frustrating to try and keep up with every new tool release or framework.

name: The AI landscape is rapidly changing, making it impossible and frustrating to tr
content: The AI landscape is rapidly changing, making it impossible and frustrating to try and keep up with every new tool release or framework.

payload.content: Instead of trying to keep up with every new AI tool, allow new tools and hypes to prove their value over time before investing in them.

name: Instead of trying to keep up with every new AI tool, allow new tools and hypes t
content: Instead of trying to keep up with every new AI tool, allow new tools and hypes to prove their value over time before investing in them.

payload.content: The goal in learning AI engineering should be to develop a mental model of how things fundamentally work, rather than attempting to use every possible tool.

name: The goal in learning AI engineering should be to develop a mental model of how t
content: The goal in learning AI engineering should be to develop a mental model of how things fundamentally work, rather than attempting to use every possible tool.

payload.content: When using roadmaps for AI engineering, treat them as a list of topics to learn from various resources rather than a rigid guide to follow word-for-word.

name: When using roadmaps for AI engineering, treat them as a list of topics to learn
content: When using roadmaps for AI engineering, treat them as a list of topics to learn from various resources rather than a rigid guide to follow word-for-word.

payload.content: To effectively network for AI engineering jobs, focus on positioning yourself to get future leads, such as connecting with people on LinkedIn/X, engaging in cold outreach correctly, or building a profile on X to share your work.

name: To effectively network for AI engineering jobs, focus on positioning yourself to
content: To effectively network for AI engineering jobs, focus on positioning yourself to get future leads, such as connecting with people on LinkedIn/X, engaging in cold outreach correctly, or building a profile on X to share your work.
